b4e23593ef02e114f30b5b85761fe1e4 (21:00): fp(7) could really use some kstat-ification
5bcf3b4c7592865c92d425e14dbb4d23 (21:01): go for it.  i can't help: ENOHARDWARE

b4e23593ef02e114f30b5b85761fe1e4 (21:03): gdamore: I'm thinking of making it so that the fp driver provides statistics which could be consumed snmp FC-MIB. At least, that's how I gather it should work.

5bcf3b4c7592865c92d425e14dbb4d23 (21:04): that seems reasonable.  i am not aware of prior art with FC though.
